context.p: In contrast to the typical electric guitar, an electric bass can have four to seven strings, which are tuned in perfect fourths. The standard tuning of an electric bass corresponds to the standard tuning of an electric guitar's first four strings, except an octave lower.

step.cmd: Ensure the settings are configured for standard tuning.
Strike each string, and turn its tuning key until the tuner indicated the proper note is reached.
